what: Quick start to using to aggregatR
title: aggregatR
code: library(GenomicRanges) library(aggregatR) library(ggplot2) files <- data.frame(file = c(     system.file('extdata', 'Scc1-calibrated_rep1.bw', package = 'aggregatR'),     system.file('extdata', 'Scc1-calibrated_rep2.bw', package = 'aggregatR') )) data(Scc1_peaks) AC <- AggregatedCoverage(Scc1_peaks, files) plot(AC) +      ggtitle('Average coverage of Scc1 ChIP-seq tracks over Scc1 peaks') +      labs(x = 'Distance to center of Scc1 peaks', y = 'Scc1 score', fill = 'file', col = 'file') +     theme_bw()

title: Standardized aggregate coverage plots
text: goal aggregatR implement AggregateCoverage S4 class Bioconductor. class standardizes computation average coverage bigwig files across number genomic loci width implements plotting method easily generate aggregate coverage plots multiple bigwig files.

title: Standardized aggregate coverage plots
text: can install development version aggregatR like : aggregatR package currently submission integrated Bioconductor. available , release version package can installed like :

title: Standardized aggregate coverage plots
code: library(GenomicRanges) library(aggregatR) library(ggplot2) files <- data.frame(file = c(     system.file('extdata', 'Scc1-calibrated_rep1.bw', package = 'aggregatR'),     system.file('extdata', 'Scc1-calibrated_rep2.bw', package = 'aggregatR') )) data(Scc1_peaks) AC <- AggregatedCoverage(Scc1_peaks, files) plot(AC) +      ggtitle('Average coverage of Scc1 ChIP-seq tracks over Scc1 peaks') +      labs(x = 'Distance to center of Scc1 peaks', y = 'Scc1 score', fill = 'file', col = 'file') +     theme_bw()

title: AggregatedCoverage class — AggregatedCoverage-class
text: class based SummarizedExperiment class. implements bigwig file import set GRanges interest computes three metrics: 1) mean coverage, 2) lower confidence interval (CI) 3) upper CI boundaries. stores metrics rectangular assay, rows represent distance center GRanges interest, columns correspond individual bigwig coverage tracks

title: AggregatedCoverage constructor — AggregatedCoverage
text: AggregatedCoverage constructor

title: AggregatedCoverage constructor — AggregatedCoverage
text: granges Genomic loci interest provided GRanges object. loci width. colData Data frame file column, containing path individual bigwig files. Additional metadata columns can provided.

title: AggregatedCoverage constructor — AggregatedCoverage
text: AggregatedCoverage object

title: AggregatedCoverage constructor — AggregatedCoverage
code: files <- data.frame(file = c(   system.file('extdata', 'Scc1-calibrated_rep1.bw', package = 'aggregatR'),   system.file('extdata', 'Scc1-calibrated_rep2.bw', package = 'aggregatR') )) data(Scc1_peaks) AC <- AggregatedCoverage(Scc1_peaks, files) #> Parsing sample 1/2 #> 1334 features retained out of 1340 #> Error in dplyr::mutate(as.data.frame(t(as.matrix(cov[sub_granges]))),     pos = seq(-unique(width(sub_granges))/2, unique(width(sub_granges))/2 -         1, by = 1)): Problem while computing `pos = seq(...)`. #> Caused by error in `width()`: #> ! could not find function "width" AC #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'AC' not found

title: AggregateCoverage method for plot generic — plot,AggregatedCoverage,ANY-method
code: files <- data.frame(file = c(   system.file('extdata', 'Scc1-calibrated_rep1.bw', package = 'aggregatR'),   system.file('extdata', 'Scc1-calibrated_rep2.bw', package = 'aggregatR') )) data(Scc1_peaks) AC <- AggregatedCoverage(Scc1_peaks, files) #> Parsing sample 1/2 #> 1334 features retained out of 1340 #> Error in dplyr::mutate(as.data.frame(t(as.matrix(cov[sub_granges]))),     pos = seq(-unique(width(sub_granges))/2, unique(width(sub_granges))/2 -         1, by = 1)): Problem while computing `pos = seq(...)`. #> Caused by error in `width()`: #> ! could not find function "width" plot(AC) #> Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'x' in selecting a method for function 'plot': object 'AC' not found
